reviews.review_msg: OMG,this course is excellent for boosting up your GPAs.2 take-home mids, one's short-answer and the other one's essay.I think the course is not organized and lectures are unhelpful.You DON'T need to come to class to get a very good mark. Almost everyone gets A+. What the HELL...? Maybe because it's summer term...bonus for hard working students ^^
Never made any sense in lecture and seems like using the lecture time to do his own studying. Tests seemed straightforward, but it ruins everything with his high grading system.
Doesn't seem to like to answer questions, or have the patience for those who ask them.  Very easy tests, but that's offset by the very high grading scale.
